events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the interview process.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully, and the technical team was impressed with your background.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM via video call with our senior developer.
You completed the technical interview with excellent feedback from the panel regarding your coding skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was successfully completed with positive engagement and discussions about your career goals.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer and are now officially part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation sessions and setup for development tools.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you have been fully onboarded as a software engineer.
